card.name: Helm of Her Secrecy
card.text: Playable before strikes are assigned on a company containing a character with a home site of Edoras facing an attack. Éowyn may be played with the company and face a strike from the attack. Place this card under Éowyn’s control. +3 EI against Faramir. If the strike Éowyn faces is not defeated, discard this card after the attack is faced. May not be duplicated.

card.name: Here, There, or Yonder
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped character at a tapped R. Tap target character and make a roll modified by +3 if the character is a Diplomat. An ally may be played if the result is greater than six plus the ally’s mind.

card.name: Hey! Come Merry Dol!
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company that has declared movement. The company’s site path contains half the number of w (round down). Discard at the end of the turn. May not be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Houses of Healing
card.text: Playable on a F. Your characters may heal at this site as though they were at a H.

card.name: King under the Mountain
card.text: Unique. Playable on Balin, Dain II, Thorin Oakenshield, or Thrain II if you have defeated a Unique Dragon manifestation. This card gives a number of miscellaneous mp equal to the kill point given by the defeated manifestation. In addition, the manifestation’s lair becomes a B, a Dwarf-Hold, and the bearer of this card gains +5 EI against Dwarf characters and +5 to influence checks against Dwarf factions.

card.name: Legendary Hoard
card.text: Playable on an At Home Dragon manifestation. The manifestation is placed off to the side with this card. Its attack still applies, and cannot be cancelled. When another manifestation of the dragon is played, rotate this card 90 degrees to a maximum of 270. A number of items per turn played at the Dragon’s Lair do not tap the site depending on the rotation: 0 — 1 90 — 2 180 — 3 270 — 4 Discard this card and the associated At Home at the end of any turn wherein a manifestation of the Dragon is defeated. May not be duplicated on a given At Home manifestation.

card.name: Look More Closely Later
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Sage at a tapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and untap the site. Sage makes a corruption check.

card.name: Lore of the Ages
card.text: Playable on an Elf at a H. All characters in the Elf’s company receive +1 to prowess.

card.name: Magical Harp
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Action: You may tap this item to prevent a character in the bearer’s company from being discarded for the rest of the turn. You may perform this action during your opponent’s turn, as well. Target character may therefore not be successfully influenced. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Many Foes He Fought
card.text: Playable on a Warrior if you have assigned him the first strike of an attack. You may assign any number of strikes of the attack to the Warrior; he faces a separate strike sequence for each. The warrior receives a -1 penalty to prowess and a -1 penalty to body for each strike he is assigned. Discard this card after the attack is faced.

card.name: Many Turns and Doublings
card.text: Playable on a Ranger facing an attack from Animals, Spiders, Undead, or Awakened Plants. Cancel the attack or Playable on a Ranger if Gates of Morning is in play. Reduce his company’s hazard limit by one.

card.name: Map to Mithril
card.text: Playable on an untapped Dwarf at a site where Information is playable. Tap the Dwarf. May not be duplicated on a given Dwarf.

card.name: Marvels Told
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage. Tap the Sage. Discard one hazard event played on a character in the Sage’s company or on the company as a whole. Sage makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Master of Esgaroth
card.text: Playable on a company whose new site is a B during Step 10 of the movement process. The company may move again.

card.name: Master of Wood, Water, or Hill
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage in a moving company. Tap the Sage. You may change on of the regions in his site path in the following manner: One w to b or one w to s or one b to w or one s to w. In all cases, the sage makes a corruption check. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Mathom Lore
card.text: Playable on a Hobbit. Action: You may tap the bearer during the organization phase to take one or two minor items from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Men of Dale
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +2, Dwarves +1

card.name: Men of Lake-town
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +2, Dwarves -1

card.name: More Sense than You
card.text: Playable on a company facing an attack before strikes are assigned. Each character or ally who chooses to tap may not be assigned a strike from the attack. Discard when the attack is faced.

card.name: Necklace of Silver and Pearls
card.text: Action: Bearer may discard this card to receive +3 Mind and +5 EI until the end of the turn. This item may also be discarded during the opponent’s site phase.

card.name: Nenseldë the Wingild
card.text: Unique. May not be assigned strikes. Action: You may tap this ally to bring a resource environment card from your discard pile to your hand. Trigger: If not at a site in Belfalas, Anfalas, Bay of Belfalas, or Mouths of Anduin during the site phase, discard this ally.

card.name: Not at Home
card.text: Playable on a Dragon, Drake, or Troll automatic attack or attack keyed to a site. The attack is cancelled or Playable on an automatic attack before strikes are assigned if Gates of Morning is in play. The number of strikes of the attack is reduced by two to a minimum of one.

card.name: Pledge of Conduct
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat when a character in the Diplomat’s company must make a corruption check. Any one item that character bears other than the One Ring is automatically transferred to the Diplomat if transferrable and the Diplomat is able to bear it.

attr.value: Keep a region card with this site to establish its region. Movement to this site is illegal if the player does not discard an Elf card from their hand when legality is checked. Characters at this site may heal and remove corruption cards as though they are at a H. Different copies of this site in play are considered different sites. This site always returns to the location deck.

card.name: Returned Exiles
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dwarves +2, Dwarf Controlling King Under The Mountain +5

attr.value: Any Dragon's Lair where the Lair's Dragon has been defeated.

card.name: Rhûn
card.text: Special Movement: Playable on a company at a site in Iron Hills, Dorwinion, Horse Plains, or Khand. The company must declare as its new site any of the aforementioned sites. Their site path is w w w, and the hazard limit for the company is reduced by two to a minimum of two. May not be duplicated on a given company. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Riddling Talk
card.text: Playable on a company facing an attack. Make a riddling roll modified by +2 for each Sage in the company and +1 for each Hobbit. The roll succeeds if greater than: 8 — Dragons and Drakes 10 — Men, Giants, and Elves 12 — Awakened Plants, Orcs, Spiders, Trolls, and Dwarves If the roll succeeds, name a card and your opponent reveals his hand. If the named card is in your opponent’s hand, the card is discarded, the attack is cancelled, and the hazard limit is reduced by 3.

card.name: Sated Beast
card.text: Discard an Ahunt manifestation. May also be played during your opponent’s turn or Playable on a Dragon or Drake attack before strikes are assigned if Doors of Night is in play. Reduce the number of strikes of the attack by one to a minimum of one.

card.name: Scabbard of Chalcedony
card.text: If bearer is a Warrior, all strikes against him receive -1 body.

card.name: Secret News
card.text: Your opponent reveals to your five random cards from his hand.

card.name: Skin-changer
card.text: Playable on Beorn. Beorn may not bear weapons, armor, shields, or helms. You may assign any number of strikes from an attack to Beorn; he faces a separate strike sequence for each strike. Beorn makes a corruption check after each attack for each strike he was assigned. Discard if Beorn is wounded. May not be duplicated.

card.name: Staff Asunder
card.text: Playable on an avatar bearing a Wizard’s Staff who is facing an attack before strikes are assigned. The attack receives -2 to body. The avatar receives +3 to prowess. After the attack is faced, discard this card and place the Wizard’s Staff in your Marshalling Point pile.

card.name: Star of High Hope
card.text: All Elf and Dúnadan characters receive +1 to prowess. If Gates of Morning is in play, this modification is instead +2.

card.name: Tales of the Hunt
card.text: Playable on a Man at a B, tapping the Man if untapped. Action: Bearer may tap to untap a character in his company.

card.name: The Riddle Game
card.text: Playable when you would otherwise be able to make an influence attempt against an opponent’s character. Tap a character to make a riddling roll and select an opponent’s character at the site to do the same. These rolls are modified by +2 if the relevant character is a sage and +1 if the relevant character is a Hobbit. In case of a tie, roll again. The player with the highest result wins the Riddle Game and may name any two cards. The loser reveals his hand and discard any of the named cards that appear.

card.name: Three Golden Hairs
card.text: Unique. Playable on a non-avatar, non-Hobbit Diplomat at the same site as any player’s Galadriel. Bearer receives +2 to corruption checks.

card.name: Thrór's Map
card.text: Unique. May only be a starting item if played with a Dwarf. Action: Discard during the site phase at a site with a hoard to untap it.

card.name: Trickery
card.text: Playable on a Scout facing an attack from: Orcs, Trolls, Men, Elves, Awakened Plants, or Giants. Make a roll. If the result is greater than 5, cancel the attack.

card.name: Twice-baked Cakes
card.text: May also be played at any tapped F or B. Action: Discard during the organization phase when declaring region movement to increase the maximum allowable regions by two.

card.name: Valiant Sword
card.text: Hoard Item. Weapon. If bearer is a Warrior, he receives +2 to prowess and +1 to body.

card.name: Vanish in Sunlight!
card.text: Playable on an Undead or Nazgûl attack. The attack receives -2 prowess. If Gates of Morning is in play, the attack receives and additional -2 prowess.

card.name: Warm Now Be Heart and Limb
card.text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. Action: Tap a Sage in the company to heal a character in the company (to a tapped state). Sage make a corruption check. Discard at the end of the organization phase.

card.name: Washed and Refreshed
card.text: Playable on a company that has declared region movement during the organizaiton phase. At the start of the long-event phase, untap a character in the company for each region card less than four played and discard this card.

card.name: Waybread
card.text: May not be a starting item. Action: Discard to untap up to a maximum of two characters in the bearer’s company.

card.name: When I Know Anything
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Diplomat at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Diplomat and the site. Action: Bearer may tap to modify a corruption check by a character in his company by +3.

card.name: Wielded Twice
card.text: Playable on an untapped Sage. Tap the Sage. You may untap an item in the Sage’s company or use a minor item ability which would normally require discarding the item. The Sage makes a corruption check.

card.name: Wit
card.text: Modify a riddling roll by +3. This card may also be played during your opponent’s turn.

card.name: Wizard Uncloaked
card.text: Spell. Playable on a Wizard (not a Fallen Wizard). Return all hazard permanent-events played on characters in the company to your opponent’s hand. The Wizard makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Wizard's Staff
card.text: Playable on an avatar at their home site on the turn they come into play. Otherwise, playable by an avatar at any site that contains a hoard. Bearer receives +2 to all corruption checks required by spells. Many not be duplicated on a given avatar.

card.name: Wondrous Maps
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using region cards with the last one being a Shadow-land [{s}]. (Play regions face-up.) This card is used as a site card, Ruins & Lairs [{R}] (automatic-attack: Orcs -- 4 strikes at 7 prowess, items: (minor, major), cards opponent draws: 3, you draw 1). The company may only leave the site using region movement. Discard Wondrous Maps when the company moves to a new site.

attr.value: Keep a region card with this site to establish its region. Different copies of this card in play are considered different sites.

card.name: Wormsbane
card.text: Unique. Hoard Item. Weapon. Dragon and Drake attacks against the bearer’s company receive -2 body. Bearer receives +4 to prowess when facing a Dragon or Drake strike.

attr.value: This site is always returned to the location deck, never to the discard pile.
The automatic-attack is removed if any manifestation of Smaug has been defeated. This site becomes a B if any manifestation of Smaug has been defeated.
Opponent may reveal and discard from their hand a creature card that can be keyed to R or S by type. The company faces an attack with equivalent attributes and type.
Itangast's Lair. If a manifestation of Itangast has been defeated, the automatic-attack is removed. This site contains a hoard.
Scatha's Lair. If a manifestation of Scatha has been defeated, the automatic-attack is removed. This site contains a hoard.
Eärcaraxë's Lair. If a manifestation of Eärcaraxë has been defeated, the automatic-attack is removed. This site contains a hoard.
Bairanax's Lair. If a manifestation of Bairanax has been defeated, the automatic-attack is removed. This site contains a hoard.
Items may be played here even if the site is tapped.
Animals - This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company; each strike is at 6 prowess
Scorba's Lair. If a manifestation of Scorba has been defeated, the automatic-attack is removed. This site contains a hoard.
